venue.name: Cook and Brown Public House Ltd

item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Cook and Brown on Hope street, near Lippitt Park on the East Side!

We're doing it again! Cook & Brown is opening just for us on a Monday Night!

HERE'S THE TWIST:

For the first time ever, Cook & Brown and CollectivePlus are offering a Classic Cocktail Class BEFORE the MNM! Jennifer Ferreira, Cook & Brown's mixologist extraordinaire will be teaching a small group how to create a classic cocktail so we can do it at home and show us how to change it up with contemporary twists to make it our own! The class will be from 6:00-7:15pm and will include a cocktail and a specially-prepared appetizer to compliment the cocktail. This is really a special treat, so check it out! http://www.collectiveplus.com/events/

PLEASE NOTE that the class before the MNM is a PAID EVENT and you MUST HAVE TICKETS!

Please note the MNM time change!

The regular Monday Night Meetup will start at 7:15pm AFTER the Classic Cocktail Class!!

Cook and Brown is a nice, relaxed gastrobar with an air of welcoming sophistication and a comfortable bar space. It also has AMAZING food and INCREDIBLE cocktails!!! You may have already heard of them or not, and if you've been, you already know. offering an array of dining options from weekend brunches (yes, they do that, and it's awesome!), fine dinner dining, to Sunday Suppers, THIS is one to know about!!! Once you go, you will be back!

Since they are opening especially for us, there will be special cocktail creations based on P-Collective beverages of choice and an appetizer menu to give you a taste of their regular delectable and tasty menu!

Please be sure to RSVP for the MNM so our numbers are accurate for the event!

I'm super-excited and I hope you are too! So, let's check it out!

http://cookandbrown.com/index.php

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever. Except Hurricane Sandy and NYE 2012.

Bring a friend!
item.how_to_find_us: They are opening JUST FOR US, so you won't have a hard time finding us!
item.name: MNM - COOK & BROWN with a TWIST!!! PLEASE read the DETAILS & START TIME!!!
